testcase.name: Comprehensive Login Page UI Testing
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should verify the tab url address for login page..................passed Then User should verify the 'LOGIN' text is displayed.......................passed Then User should verify the Login button is disabled........................passed Then User should verify the field label name and placeholder text for Email and Password fields.passed When User should enter password in password field...........................passed Then User should verify that entered password is **hide.....................passed And User should click the eye icon in the Password field....................passed Then User should verify that entered password is Unhide.....................passed And User should verify Forget password link is working......................passed Then User should verify the copy rights "Powered by Alphind © 2023" text is displayed.passed

testcase.name: To verify the error validation messages in Login page
